title: Enjoying Pre-Flight Lunch at Narita Airport
description: Make the most of your limited time before your flight. We'll introduce you to a diverse range of lunch spots at Narita Airport, from vegan ramen to authentic Japanese cuisine and takoyaki.
content:
# Enjoying Pre-Flight Lunch at Narita Airport

As the gateway to international flights, Narita Airport boasts a diverse array of restaurants where you can make the most of your pre-departure time. Even if you're a traveler with limited time, we'll introduce you to some great spots to enjoy a delicious lunch. Savor the flavors of Japan before your flight!

## Vegan Ramen Specialty Shop

<Place id="ChIJUYM9BwDzImARWDB1k2SP5sA" />
A vegan ramen specialty shop located in Narita Airport Terminal 2. Their Tantanmen, made exclusively with plant-based ingredients and no animal products, offers a rich yet healthy flavor. It's highly recommended not only for vegetarians and vegans but also for health-conscious individuals. Enjoy a body-friendly bowl of ramen before your flight. It's perfect for a light meal before boarding.

## Japanese Cuisine Restaurant

<Place id="ChIJb9poKgrzImARyEE4EHCmkss" />
A restaurant inside Narita Airport where you can enjoy authentic Japanese cuisine. Their menu features a lineup of traditional Japanese dishes, including sushi, tempura, and various set meals. It's perfect for travelers who want to savor the taste of Japan before their departure. The dishes, prepared carefully with fresh ingredients, offer an authentic flavor that's hard to believe you're getting inside an airport. You can enjoy a proper meal even when you're short on time.

## Takoyaki Specialty Shop

<Place id="ChIJZUgEeXTzImARvVxQoRCKLZM" />
Tsukiji Gindaco, located inside Narita Airport. Their piping hot takoyaki boasts an exquisite texture, crispy on the outside and wonderfully creamy on the inside. It's perfect as a light snack or treat before your flight. You can easily enjoy this classic Japanese "B-grade gourmet" dish before boarding. Takeout is also available, making it a popular choice for a final taste of Japan before you head to your gate.

## A Fulfilling Lunchtime at Narita Airport

From vegan ramen and authentic Japanese cuisine to takoyaki, Narita Airport offers a diverse range of lunch spots where you can enjoy a meal even with limited time before your flight. Why not treat yourself to a delicious, uniquely Japanese lunch before you depart?
